ai-patthana15.47:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.47:0.3_0: Transmigration over the wholesome mind, produced by the unprofitable,
ai-patthana15.47:1.1_0: mind consciousness arises in the eighteen mental preoccupations. ...
ai-patthana15.47:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.47:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.47:2.1_3: What is an unshakable, in the three ways?
